summary: This is an email correspondence from January 29, 2020, regarding an analysis of Epstein trust documents. The sender provides an attached summary/analysis of trust documents received, incorporating previous 2019 analysis, and offers to walk recipients through the document.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The email discusses analysis of Epstein trust documents, indicating he is the subject of the financial trusts being analyzed.

events.title: Previous Epstein trust analysis
events.description: The sender references having done a previous analysis of Epstein trusts in 2019, which has been incorporated into the current document.

events.title: Distribution of Epstein trust analysis
events.description: An email is sent with an attached summary/analysis of Epstein trust documents to multiple recipients, offering further explanation.

keyFacts: An analysis of Epstein trust documents was conducted and distributed via email on January 29, 2020.
The analysis incorporates previous work on Epstein trusts from 2019.
The document includes tabs for each trust and chronological amendments, plus key and summary tabs.
The sender advises against printing the document due to the size of the Excel tables.
